commands.name: az pipelines agent list
commands.summary: Get a list of agents in a pool.
commands.syntax:
az pipelines agent list --pool-id
                        [--agent-name]
                        [--demands]
                        [--detect {false, true}]
                        [--include-assigned-request {false, true}]
                        [--include-capabilities {false, true}]
                        [--include-last-completed-request {false, true}]
                        [--org]

commands.name: az pipelines agent show
commands.syntax:
az pipelines agent show --agent-id
                        --pool-id
                        [--detect {false, true}]
                        [--include-assigned-request {false, true}]
                        [--include-capabilities {false, true}]
                        [--include-last-completed-request {false, true}]
                        [--org]
